title: Under The Sun
description: Under The Sun : Cowboy Romance storiesAshley is a 27-year old schoolteacher, recently divorced, and a single mom to a pair of precocious five-year-old twin boys. Desperately trying to move on, she decides to take a job in Montana to see if getting closer to nature can change her life's direction. In school, she meets a pair of mischievous twin girls. This gives her the opportunity to meet their good-looking single dad, Tanner, only thirty years of age – who resembled the man of her fantasies. Ashley is smitten. However, as she begins to get to know him better, she's afraid of making the same mistake of falling in love with a man who’s a child-at-heart. An unexpected event immediately tips the balance and Ashley becomes confused. She is forced to weigh down her priorities, between her personal happiness, and her responsibility to her children.
author: Marie S. Emery
